description:
Beating Depression Breakthrough is an 8 week course designed to help student take control of their depression by use of numerous tools & techniques.

Depression is major problem - particularly in western societies & it doesn't need to be the case. There are many facets in managing Depression - this course examines them all - both internal as well as external.

Student receive a daily video to keep them on track & gaining momentum to have their of depression 'Breakthrough'

The major difference with this course that sets it apart is that it covers all elements of depression - but the major advantage is that full support is offered to students - help is only a message or an email away - to keep students on course.
title: Beating Depression Breakthrough
